bioAsHtml: I'am a professor/instructor and win s an expert information security development with over 15 years of experience in the security, secure coding, network and telecommunication arena. I holds the CSWAE, CPTE, CPTC and CIHE and CEH. I holds a chair position at OWASP in Morrocco and OWASP AppSec Africa.

acceptedTalks.title: Test de pénétration Web avancé et codage sécurisé

bio:
I'am a professor/instructor and win s an expert information security development with over 15 years of experience in the security, secure coding, network and telecommunication arena. 
I holds the CSWAE, CPTE, CPTC and CIHE and CEH.
I holds a chair position at OWASP in Morrocco and OWASP AppSec Africa.
